metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17495 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: django-celery-results through 1.2.1 stores task results in the database.Among the data it stores are the variables passed into the tasks. Thevariables may contain sensitive cleartext information that does not belongunencrypted in the database.

criterions.comment: python-django-celery-results: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
